entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
